00075       public override MethodBase SelectMethod(BindingFlags bindingAttr, MethodBase[] match, Type[] types, ParameterModifier[] modifiers)
00076       {
00077          bool matchFound;
00078          int currentMatch, bestMatch = -1;
00079          for (int i = 0; i < match.Length; i++)
00080          {
00081             ParameterInfo[] pars = match[i].GetParameters();
00082             if (pars.Length == types.Length)
00083             {
00084                matchFound = true;
00085                currentMatch = 0;
00086                int j = 0;
00087                while (j < pars.Length && matchFound)
00088                {
00089                   Type t = types[j];
00090                   matchFound = (!pars[j].ParameterType.IsValueType && types[j] == NullType.Default) || 
00091                      ((bindingAttr & BindingFlags.ExactBinding) == 0 ? (AbstractHelper.IsAssignableFrom(pars[j].ParameterType, t) && (!t.IsValueType || pars[j].ParameterType.IsValueType)) : pars[j].ParameterType == types[j]);
00092                   if (matchFound && pars[j].ParameterType.FullName.Equals(types[j].FullName))
00093                      currentMatch++;
00094                   j++;
00095                }
00096                
00097                if (matchFound && currentMatch > bestMatch)
00098                {
00099                   bestMatch = currentMatch;
00100                   MethodBase temp = match[0];
00101                   match[0] = match[i];
00102                   match[i] = temp;
00103                }
00104             }
00105          }
00106          return bestMatch != -1 ? match[0] : null;
00107       }
